heroTitle: Grim Baddies for Old School Gaming
heroSubtitle: Bold black & white miniatures inspired by OSR artwork. Gaming pieces, not shelf queens.

osrSection.title: The OSR Aesthetic
osrSection.subtitle: Bold & Simple, Just Like OSR Art
osrSection.description:
You instantly know OSR-style artwork by its bold black and white "color" scheme. My minis take this into 3 dimensions with matte black priming and simple dry brushing to bring details out.

No fancy techniques, no endless highlighting. Just clean, bold details that pop on the gaming table and capture that authentic old-school vibe your campaign deserves.

**You can keep it real and play with them as Crom intended, or slap on some speedpaint to make them fancy.**
